name: Speedway Multiplayer
description:
A multi-player Motorcycle Speedway game, with up to 4 players on one device!

If you and your friends have some time to kill, you can play all together on one device. You can also network your devices so that each player can use his or her own gadget. In the mean time, practice your skills on your own.

Remember, you can only go straight or turn left but you can’t reverse nor turn right. You have to tap the turn button with sensitively to keep the optimum racing line!

Good luck!
